optionDescriptions.getNotifiedIfANewExerciseHasBeenCreatedO: Get notified when a (new) exercise has been created or started
optionDescriptions.getNotifiedIfAnExerciseHasBeenOpenedForP: Get notified when an exercise has been opened for practice (e.g. Quiz)
optionDescriptions.getNotifiedIfANewPostAboutAnExerciseHasB: Get notified when a new post about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.getNotifiedIfANewAnswerPostAboutAnExerci: Get notified when a new answer post about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.receiveANotificationWhenAnAttachmentWasC: Receive a notification when an attachment was changed
optionDescriptions.getNotifiedWhenANewPostAboutAnExerciseHa: Get notified when a new post about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.getNotifiedWhenANewAnswerPostAboutAnExer: Get notified when a new answer post about an exercise has been created
optionDescriptions.receiveANotificationWhenTheProcessOfArch: Receive a notification when the process of archiving a course or exam has been started
